item.description:
This meet-up is FREE, all they ask for at the door is donation, so please bring something to support!

 

Hosted by Lawrence Rock and the lovely Ms. Era Ellis
Lets join them as we ring in the holiday season with cocktails, a full menu, and most importantly holiday cheer!
Attire is Casual Chic (please no sneakers)
Last year, they supported the Greater Boston Food Bank through awesome canned food donations.

 

This year, they're giving the gift of education to young people of Boston!!! Donations appreciated to benefit the GBKC, Inc. a 501c3 organization dedicated to the scholarship of Greater Boston high school students.

Another meet-up group that I am part of is doing this as a meet-up so I thought it would be nice if our group did too.

More info to come on a karaoke meet-up because there seems to be an interest!
item.name: Ring in the Holiday Season
